data.comment: The match is underway. Reading have kicked-off.
Goal! Yakou Meite gives Reading a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 3, Goal! Blackburn go level at 1-1 through Adam Armstrong in Blackburn.
Lewis Holtby (Blackburn) has received a first yellow card.
Michael Olise scores to make it 1-2 at Ewood Park.
In the minute 18, Goal! Josh Laurent extends Reading's lead to 1-3.
Tom Trybull (Blackburn) gets a yellow card.
The first-half is over at Ewood Park.
In the minute 46, Blackburn kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Sam Gallagher is replacing Corry Evans for the home team.
Adam Armstrong (Blackburn) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 2-3.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Yakou Meite with Sone Aluko.
Rafael is booked for the away team.
At Ewood Park, Lucas Joao has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Lewis Holtby with John Buckley. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
Tyrhys Dolan is replacing Ben Brereton for Blackburn at Ewood Park.
It's now 2-4 in Blackburn as Lucas Joao scores for Reading.
In the minute 84, Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a second substitution, with Tom McIntyre replacing Lucas Joao.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-4.
